item.title: Avi & Matt Cover the Tech Apocalypse
item.description: Transcription In this episode: More Tech Layoffs Will a Bad Economy Mean Scrappier Founders New Linux Foundation Survey on Measuring the Economic Value Open Source Is Open Source Controlled by Big Corperations Is Open Source any More Insecutre then Other Software? A Trade War Brewing in Open Source? Is the Cloud Hangover Upon Us? The Biggest Lies in the Open Source
item.content:
Transcription

In this episode:

  • More Tech Layoffs
  • Will a Bad Economy Mean Scrappier Founders
  • New Linux Foundation Survey on Measuring the Economic Value Open Source
  • Is Open Source Controlled by Big Corperations
  • Is Open Source any More Insecutre then Other Software?
  • A Trade War Brewing in Open Source?
  • Is the Cloud Hangover Upon Us?
  • The Biggest Lies in the Open Source
